name: BED_BLOCK
description: This view contains information about your bed block records. The records included in this view are Bed Events (BEV) records that are designated as bed blocks -- that is, Event Type (I BEV 150) has a value of 1.

columns.name: BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed event record.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this bed event.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The record status category number for this bed event.

columns.name: BED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the bed that this bed event pertains to.

columns.name: FACILITY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location containing the bed that this bed event pertains to.

columns.name: ACTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description: The active flag category number for the bed event.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department containing the bed that this bed event pertains to.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient that was associated with this bed block.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the patient encounter that was associated with this bed event.

columns.name: BLOCK_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The blocking reason category number for the bed event.

columns.name: BLOCK_SRC_ISO_C_NAME
columns.description: The isolation category number that was the source of this bed event.

columns.name: BLOCK_SRC_INF_C_NAME
columns.description: The infection category number that was the source of this bed event.
